attributes.action: ask Cadburys to bring back the popular chocolate bar Frys Five Centres
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Having recently contacted Cadburys chocolate about Frys Five Centre Bars being brought back we the undersigned believe the Prime Ministers support might persuade them to reintroduce this legendary chocolate bar.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
